contact_info.hours: Monday through Friday from 8:00 a.m.to 6:00 p.m.EST

steps: Check to make sure the mailing address is correct.
Print any corrections in the box on the right.
Include a copy of an official identification that contains your name, current address, and date of birth.
Attach a copy of your identification.
Attach a copy of your identification to the enclosed self-addressed envelope or mail to: 522723285 Attn Consumer Relations P.O.Box 2959 Winston-Salem NC 27102

certification.statement: I certify that I am a smoker: am 21 years of age or older; and that Driver's license, sporting license, MEDICAID Voucher or State ID.
certification.note: The address on your official identification must match the address where you will receive mailings or we will be unable to process the Age Verification Form.

offer_restriction: Offer Restricted to Smokers 21 Years of Age or Older.
